name: Gugalanna
description: Gugalanna is a Huge Celestial creature characterized by its immense power and chaotic good nature, featuring high mobility and striking features.
memorable: Gugalanna maintains distance while dealing damage with its Flyby ability and boasts significant resistance to various attacks.
goals: To protect and challenge those it encounters, serving a guardian role while also engaging in combat.
relations: Related to other celestial beings and could be encountered with allies that share its chaotic good alignment.
environment: Typically found in celestial realms or places infused with magic.
strengths: Immunities to fire and radiant damage make it highly resilient in combat, with significant combat abilities via its special traits.
weaknesses: Susceptible to necrotic damage, which can be exploited in battle.
attacks: Delivers a devastating melee attack using its horns, dealing piercing and fire damage, and follows up with a powerful kick.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to avoid opportunity attacks while flying allows Gugalanna to maintain an advantageous position in battle.
senses: Possesses truesight up to 60 feet, allowing it to see things as they truly are.
skills: Noteworthy skills in athletics, insight, and intimidation, showcasing its physical prowess and presence.
additional_information: Ability to perform Multiattacks, executing two different attacks in a single turn.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Trampling Charge can knock targets prone, allowing for additional attacks.
test_queries: huge celestial creature with powerful melee attacks
flying creature that can avoid opportunity attacks
chaotic good celestial being with truesight
creature that uses magic resistance in battle
